author: iarspider
body:
#### PR description:

The new unit tests introduced in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/41093 by @missirol are failing on PowerPC due to an extra line being printed out:

```
$ diff -u testDataFormatsScoutingRun2_expected.log testDataFormatsScoutingRun2_step2.log
--- testDataFormatsScoutingRun2_expected.log    2023-03-25 23:03:42.000000001 +0100
+++ testDataFormatsScoutingRun2_step2.log     2023-03-25 23:26:09.000000001 +0100
@@ -1,3 +1,4 @@
+Disabling gnu++: clang has no __float128 support on this target!
 --------------------------------------------------
 Run             = 1
 LuminosityBlock = 291048
```

#### PR validation:

Test ran locally.
title: [PowerPC] Fix unit tests in DataFormats/Scouting
